feature1.explanation: Both texts use a variety of punctuation marks such as hyphens, brackets, colons, commas, and quotation marks.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical and grammatical features with consistent word choice and part of speech usage.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the alignment in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, there is moderate confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
